teal.field

Class UnitField

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.field.UnitField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vector3dField

    public class UnitField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vector3dField
    UnitField: normalized vector field UnitField is a wrapper class for Field which transforms the get methods so that a UnitNormal value is returned from the get method. So that the magnitude at every point in the field is one, but the direction is the same.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.7 $
    Author:
    Andrew McKinney, Phil Bailey, Michael Danziger
